DBO.name: pbs_PM_CONTRACT_{XXX}
DBO.Install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS pbs_PM_CONTRACT_{XXX}( [LINE_NO] integer NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, [CONTRACT_NO] [nvarchar](25) NOT NULL, [CONTRACT_DATE] [int] NOT NULL, [CONTRACTOR] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [CONSTRUCTION_UNIT] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [CONSTRUCTION_UNIT_NAME] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL, [CONTRACT_TYPE] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [CONTRACT_FORM] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [CURRENCY] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [CONTRACT_VALUE] [decimal](18, 2) NOT NULL, [VAT_RATE] [decimal](18, 2) NOT NULL, [VAT_AMOUNT] [decimal](18, 2) NOT NULL, [RETENTION_RATE] [decimal](18, 2) NOT NULL, [RETENTION_AMOUNT] [decimal](18, 2) NOT NULL, [PROJECT_CODE] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [PERFORMANCE_SECURITY_RATE] [decimal](18, 2) NOT NULL, [PERFORMANCE_SECURITY_AMOUNT] [decimal](18, 2) NOT NULL, [VALID_TO] [int] NOT NULL, [PERFORM_FROM] [int] NOT NULL, [PERFORM_TO] [int] NOT NULL, [CONTRACT_CONTENTS] [nvarchar](2000) NOT NULL, [PROCESSING_REQUEST] [nvarchar](2000) NOT NULL, [PAYMENT_TERMS] [nvarchar](200) NOT NULL, [COMMENTS] [nvarchar](200) NOT NULL, [APPENDIX] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [UPDATED] [int] NOT NULL, [UPDATED_BY] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [TIME_STAMP] [timestamp] NULL )

DBO.name: pbs_PM_CONTRACT_{XXX}_Insert
pbs_PM_CONTRACT_{XXX}_Update
DBO.Install: INSERT OR IGNORE INTO system_STORED_PROCEDURES VALUES ('pbs_PM_CONTRACT_{XXX}_Update','UPDATE OR IGNORE pbs_PM_CONTRACT_{XXX} SET [CONTRACT_NO] = @CONTRACT_NO, [CONTRACT_DATE] = @CONTRACT_DATE, [CONTRACTOR] = @CONTRACTOR, [CONSTRUCTION_UNIT] = @CONSTRUCTION_UNIT, [CONSTRUCTION_UNIT_NAME] = @CONSTRUCTION_UNIT_NAME, [CONTRACT_TYPE] = @CONTRACT_TYPE, [CONTRACT_FORM] = @CONTRACT_FORM, [CURRENCY] = @CURRENCY, [CONTRACT_VALUE] = @CONTRACT_VALUE, [VAT_RATE] = @VAT_RATE, [VAT_AMOUNT] = @VAT_AMOUNT, [RETENTION_RATE] = @RETENTION_RATE, [RETENTION_AMOUNT] = @RETENTION_AMOUNT, [PROJECT_CODE] = @PROJECT_CODE, [PERFORMANCE_SECURITY_RATE] = @PERFORMANCE_SECURITY_RATE, [PERFORMANCE_SECURITY_AMOUNT] = @PERFORMANCE_SECURITY_AMOUNT, [VALID_TO] = @VALID_TO, [PERFORM_FROM] = @PERFORM_FROM, [PERFORM_TO] = @PERFORM_TO, [CONTRACT_CONTENTS] = @CONTRACT_CONTENTS, [PROCESSING_REQUEST] = @PROCESSING_REQUEST, [PAYMENT_TERMS] = @PAYMENT_TERMS, [COMMENTS] = @COMMENTS, [APPENDIX] = @APPENDIX, [UPDATED] = @UPDATED, [UPDATED_BY] = @UPDATED_BY WHERE [LINE_NO] = @LINE_NO ')

DBO.name: pbs_PM_WBS_{XXX}
DBO.Install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS pbs_PM_WBS_{XXX}( [LINE_NO] integer NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, [CONTRACT_NO] [int] NOT NULL, [WBS] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [DESCRIPTION] [nvarchar](250) NOT NULL, [UNIT] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [WORK_VOLUME] [decimal](18, 2) NOT NULL, [LABOR] [char](1) NOT NULL, [MATERIALS] [char](1) NOT NULL, [MACHINES] [char](1) NOT NULL, [UNIT_PRICE] [decimal](18, 2) NOT NULL, [TOTAL_AMOUNT] [decimal](18, 2) NOT NULL, [PERFORM_FROM_DATE] [int] NOT NULL, [PERFORM_TO_DATE] [int] NOT NULL, [PERFORMED_BY] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [UPDATED] [int] NOT NULL, [UPDATED_BY] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [TIME_STAMP] [timestamp] NULL )

DBO.name: pbs_PM_WBS_{XXX}_Insert
pbs_PM_WBS_{XXX}_Update
DBO.Install: INSERT OR IGNORE INTO system_STORED_PROCEDURES VALUES ('pbs_PM_WBS_{XXX}_Update]','UPDATE OR IGNORE [pbs_PM_WBS_{XXX}] SET [CONTRACT_NO] = @CONTRACT_NO, [WBS] = @WBS, [DESCRIPTION] = @DESCRIPTION, [UNIT] = @UNIT, [WORK_VOLUME] = @WORK_VOLUME, [LABOR] = @LABOR, [MATERIALS] = @MATERIALS, [MACHINES] = @MACHINES, [UNIT_PRICE] = @UNIT_PRICE, [TOTAL_AMOUNT] = @TOTAL_AMOUNT, [PERFORM_FROM_DATE] = @PERFORM_FROM_DATE, [PERFORM_TO_DATE] = @PERFORM_TO_DATE, [PERFORMED_BY] = @PERFORMED_BY, [UPDATED] = @UPDATED, [UPDATED_BY] = @UPDATED_BY WHERE [LINE_NO] = @LINE_NO ')

DBO.name: pbs_PM_LEDGER_DEM
DBO.Install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS pbs_PM_LEDGER_DEM ([LINE_NO] integer NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, [REFERENCE] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [TRANS_TYPE] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [TRANS_DATE] [int] NOT NULL , [PERIOD] [int] NOT NULL , [CUSTOMER_CODE] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [CONTRACT_NO] [nvarchar](25) NOT NULL , [TRANS_AMT] [numeric](18, 3) NOT NULL , [CONV_CODE] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [CONV_RATE] [numeric](18, 9) NOT NULL , [AMOUNT] [numeric](18, 3) NOT NULL , [D_C] [varchar](1) NOT NULL , [PAYMENT_REF] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL , [PAY_METHOD] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [PAYMENT_DATE] [int] NOT NULL , [PAYMENT_PERIOD] [int] NOT NULL , [INVOICE_NO] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [INVOICE_SERIAL] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [INVOICE_BOOK] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [INVOICE_DATE] [int] NOT NULL , [INVOICE_PERIOD] [int] NOT NULL , [NC_CN0] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [NC_CN1] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [NC_CN2] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [NC_CN3] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [NC_CN4] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [NC_CN5] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [NC_CN6] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [NC_CN7] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [NC_CN8] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [NC_CN9] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [ALLOCATION] [varchar](1) NOT NULL , [ALLOC_REF] [int] NOT NULL , [ALLOC_DATE] [int] NOT NULL , [ALLOC_PERIOD] [int] NOT NULL , [STATUS] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [LOCK_FLAG] [varchar](1) NOT NULL , [POSTING_DATE] [int] NOT NULL , [POSTED_BY] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [HOLD_OP_ID] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [BPH_NO] [int] NOT NULL , [PFD_NO] [int] NOT NULL , [EXT_DESC1] [nvarchar](100) NOT NULL , [EXT_DESC2] [nvarchar](100) NOT NULL , [EXT_DESC3] [nvarchar](100) NOT NULL , [EXT_DESC4] [nvarchar](100) NOT NULL , [EXT_DESC5] [nvarchar](100) NOT NULL , [EXT_DATE1] [int] NOT NULL , [EXT_DATE2] [int] NOT NULL , [EXT_DATE3] [int] NOT NULL , [EXT_DATE4] [int] NOT NULL , [EXT_DATE5] [int] NOT NULL , [EXT_VAL1] [numeric](18, 3) NOT NULL , [EXT_VAL2] [numeric](18, 3) NOT NULL , [EXT_VAL3] [numeric](18, 3) NOT NULL , [EXT_VAL4] [numeric](18, 3) NOT NULL , [EXT_VAL5] [numeric](18, 3) NOT NULL , [TIME_STAMP] [timestamp] NULL )

pbs_PM_LEDGER_DEM_Update
DBO.Install: INSERT OR IGNORE INTO system_STORED_PROCEDURES VALUES ('pbs_PM_LEDGER_DEM_Update', 'UPDATE OR IGNORE [pbs_PM_LEDGER_DEM] SET [REFERENCE] = @REFERENCE, [TRANS_TYPE] = @TRANS_TYPE, [TRANS_DATE] = @TRANS_DATE, [PERIOD] = @PERIOD, [CUSTOMER_CODE] = @CUSTOMER_CODE, [CONTRACT_NO] = @CONTRACT_NO, [TRANS_AMT] = @TRANS_AMT, [CONV_CODE] = @CONV_CODE, [CONV_RATE] = @CONV_RATE, [AMOUNT] = @AMOUNT, [D_C] = @D_C, [PAYMENT_REF] = @PAYMENT_REF, [PAY_METHOD] = @PAY_METHOD, [PAYMENT_DATE] = @PAYMENT_DATE, [PAYMENT_PERIOD] = @PAYMENT_PERIOD, [INVOICE_NO] = @INVOICE_NO, [INVOICE_SERIAL] = @INVOICE_SERIAL, [INVOICE_BOOK] = @INVOICE_BOOK, [INVOICE_DATE] = @INVOICE_DATE, [INVOICE_PERIOD] = @INVOICE_PERIOD, [NC_CN0] = @NC_CN0, [NC_CN1] = @NC_CN1, [NC_CN2] = @NC_CN2, [NC_CN3] = @NC_CN3, [NC_CN4] = @NC_CN4, [NC_CN5] = @NC_CN5, [NC_CN6] = @NC_CN6, [NC_CN7] = @NC_CN7, [NC_CN8] = @NC_CN8, [NC_CN9] = @NC_CN9, [ALLOCATION] = @ALLOCATION, [ALLOC_REF] = @ALLOC_REF, [ALLOC_DATE] = @ALLOC_DATE, [ALLOC_PERIOD] = @ALLOC_PERIOD, [STATUS] = @STATUS, [LOCK_FLAG] = @LOCK_FLAG, [POSTING_DATE] = @POSTING_DATE, [POSTED_BY] = @POSTED_BY, [HOLD_OP_ID] = @HOLD_OP_ID, [BPH_NO] = @BPH_NO, [PFD_NO] = @PFD_NO, [EXT_DESC1] = @EXT_DESC1, [EXT_DESC2] = @EXT_DESC2, [EXT_DESC3] = @EXT_DESC3, [EXT_DESC4] = @EXT_DESC4, [EXT_DESC5] = @EXT_DESC5, [EXT_DATE1] = @EXT_DATE1, [EXT_DATE2] = @EXT_DATE2, [EXT_DATE3] = @EXT_DATE3, [EXT_DATE4] = @EXT_DATE4, [EXT_DATE5] = @EXT_DATE5, [EXT_VAL1] = @EXT_VAL1, [EXT_VAL2] = @EXT_VAL2, [EXT_VAL3] = @EXT_VAL3, [EXT_VAL4] = @EXT_VAL4, [EXT_VAL5] = @EXT_VAL5 WHERE [LINE_NO] = @LINE_NO')

DBO.name: pbs_PM_PROGRESS_DEM
DBO.Install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS pbs_PM_PROGRESS_DEM ([LINE_NO] integer NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, [CONTRACT_NO] [nvarchar](25) NOT NULL , [APPENDIX] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [PROJECT_CODE] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [STAGE_NO] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [WBS_CODE] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [INSPECTION_DATE] [int] NOT NULL , [INSPECTION_TIME] [int] NOT NULL , [COMPLETED_JOB_PRORATE] [decimal](18, 2) NOT NULL , [COMPLETED_JOB] [decimal](18, 2) NOT NULL , [DOCUMENTATION] [nvarchar](2000) NOT NULL , [JOB_QUALITY_COMMENT] [nvarchar](2000) NOT NULL , [RESULT] [nvarchar](2000) NOT NULL , [NOTES] [nvarchar](200) NOT NULL , [INVESTOR] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [CONTRACTOR] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [CONSTRUCTION_UNIT] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [OTHER_PARTIES] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [UPDATED] [int] NOT NULL , [UPDATED_BY] [varchar](15) NOT NULL , [TIME_STAMP] [timestamp] NULL )

DBO.name: pbs_PM_PROGRESS_DEM_Insert
pbs_PM_PROGRESS_DEM_Update
DBO.Install: INSERT OR IGNORE INTO system_STORED_PROCEDURES VALUES ('pbs_PM_PROGRESS_DEM_Update', 'UPDATE OR IGNORE [pbs_PM_PROGRESS_DEM] SET [CONTRACT_NO] = @CONTRACT_NO, [APPENDIX] = @APPENDIX, [PROJECT_CODE] = @PROJECT_CODE, [STAGE_NO] = @STAGE_NO, [WBS_CODE] = @WBS_CODE, [INSPECTION_DATE] = @INSPECTION_DATE, [INSPECTION_TIME] = @INSPECTION_TIME, [COMPLETED_JOB_PRORATE] = @COMPLETED_JOB_PRORATE, [COMPLETED_JOB] = @COMPLETED_JOB, [DOCUMENTATION] = @DOCUMENTATION, [JOB_QUALITY_COMMENT] = @JOB_QUALITY_COMMENT, [RESULT] = @RESULT, [NOTES] = @NOTES, [INVESTOR] = @INVESTOR, [CONTRACTOR] = @CONTRACTOR, [CONSTRUCTION_UNIT] = @CONSTRUCTION_UNIT, [OTHER_PARTIES] = @OTHER_PARTIES, [UPDATED] = @UPDATED, [UPDATED_BY] = @UPDATED_BY WHERE [LINE_NO] = @LINE_NO')
